title: What's an incredibly good song you just don't like? - Quora

response.answer_text: being a hardcore music lover and a die hard rock/metal fan, i never liked ACDC, rod stewart, elton john and michael jackson (notwithstanding few songs which i do like but it does not go to the extent of liking the band/group as such) the world love them, but i personally feel these ppl just can NOT sing.. however, talking of one good song which i don’t like, its going to be queen’s bohemian rhapsody (did i spell it right..?).. does not deserve the recognition that it got.

This is one song I can not bear to listen to. If it comes on the radio I just have to change station.  It is probably a great song but when Bill Withers do that bit that goes A lovely dayA lovely ddaaaayy there is just no melody in his drone. Sorry, I have tried to like it but I just can’t Best regards Bob
